extendedInfo.description: This app is very simple. All you will see is a black screen. Just start touching the screen to see where your finger registers on the screen.This app serves two purposes:1. Your fingers touch a portion of the screen, but the touch screen only registers a single pixel. This allows you to see exactly where your device registers your touch.2. Find out if there are any areas that do not register your touch. For example, your device will likely not register the far edges of your screen.UPDATE: Sorry about it not having an exit button. My phone has physical buttons so I never thought it was a problem. The EXIT button is placed randomly, so if you want to test the screen where the EXIT is, just exit and return to test that area.

reviews.title: Does what it say\'s
reviews.comment: Testing for damage to touch screen and this program shows up the spot (or in my case strip).  Thank you for help with problem, but now off to get my phone repaired :(
reviews.author: Martin Dudman

reviews.title: Simple, but extremely useful
reviews.comment: I\'ve suspected for done time that something was off about my touch screen, and thus spp helped me expose a rectangular dead spot
reviews.author: Don Gregory

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Program is great and easy to use only made to test screen for dead spots and thanks to you I found my thunderbolt had a huge dead spot.... and to the idiot wanting pinch test your a moron .. this app is to see if screen working not if your phone has multi touch
reviews.author: Jose Guzman

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I thought my phone screen was unresponsive and I found this little app which is pretty cool and found my screen does register touch everywhere on the screen. Must be phone lag. thanks very much best free app ever.
reviews.author: Moz Afzal

reviews.title: Good app idea
reviews.comment: Well it confirmed my suspicions.. now I just don\'t know what to do. I guess I\'ll have to eventually get a diff phone =/
reviews.author: Samantha Moose

reviews.comment: Great just what i was looking for just could you install a reset button
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Did exactly what was expected
reviews.author: Ken Addams

reviews.title: Fix touch senstivity
reviews.comment: Grear app, But how to fix the rest of screen where touch does not accept!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only peeve is that I cant exit with my back button and the onscreen exit is coincidently in a dead spot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wonderfull
reviews.comment: I loved it, it made me know the bad area in my screen.
reviews.author: Mohamed Abdelfattah

reviews.title: Does as says
reviews.comment: It does register each touch a a single point and helps lock down what and where might be problems . Exactly what I needed and looked for. Thank you.

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.comment: You could add a reset button. And the back button closing feature.

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: This is the second time I\'ve needed this app and does exactly what it says. Which unfortunately proves I need to fix my phone again..

reviews.comment: Helped pinpoint defective screen under warranty

reviews.comment: App works nexus 10 had a dead spot

reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
